nodes.text: Drakag were hulking but quick-witted creatures native to Seline. They were unknown to the galaxy until the Galactic War when a conflict on Seline brought them to the attention of Galactic Republic and reconstituted Sith Empire who used them as beasts of burden on the planet's rough terrain.
Drakags appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic as player mounts available from the "Spoils of War" Cartel Pack.
